statements: SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientContacts;
SELECT * FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientContacts ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_id > 5 ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' AND client_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM ClientContacts WHERE client_id > 50 AND (client_email LIKE '%gmail%' OR client_phone LIKE '%555%');
SELECT client_name, LENGTH(client_email) AS email_length FROM ClientContacts WHERE LENGTH(client_phone) > 10 ORDER BY email_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT clients.client_name, projects.project_name FROM clients INNER JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM Clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT team_member_name, team_member_role FROM ProjectTeam ORDER BY team_member_role ASC, team_member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status, client_name FROM Projects INNER JOIN Clients ON Projects.client_id = Clients.client_id WHERE project_status='In Progress';
SELECT team_member_name, team_member_role FROM ProjectTeam WHERE team_member_role LIKE '%Manager%';

SELECT client_name, project_name, project_description, team_member_role FROM Clients JOIN Projects ON Clients.client_id = Projects.client_id JOIN ProjectTeam ON Projects.project_id = ProjectTeam.project_id ORDER BY client_name, project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, contact_person_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT contact_person_name, contact_person_phone FROM Clients WHERE client_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM ProjectDetails WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT client_name, contact_person_email FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients JOIN ProjectDetails ON Clients.client_id = ProjectDetails.client_id WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT client_name, project_name FROM Clients JOIN ProjectDetails ON Clients.client_id = ProjectDetails.client_id ORDER BY client_name ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT architect_id, name, phone_number FROM architects WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT project_id, specification FROM project_specifications WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT architects.name, project_architects.project_id FROM architects JOIN project_architects ON architects.architect_id = project_architects.architect_id;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(project_id) AS project_count FROM projects GROUP BY client_id HAVING project_count > 1;
SELECT projects.project_name, project_specifications.specification FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_specifications ON projects.project_id = project_specifications.project_id;
